plan.plan_title: DC Fast Charger Outage in Electronic City

steps.details: Assess substation logs to identify the breaker trip root cause and isolate affected circuits.
Send electrical crews to reset breakers and replace damaged components if needed.
Push outage notifications and direct users to alternative charging hubs or mobile charging units.
Offer towing or jump-start services for stranded EVs where safe to do so.
Log incident for improving redundancy at critical fast-charging nodes.
Dispatch tow trucks and clear stalled vehicles from ramps to prevent collisions and restore flow.
Police to document collision scenes and ensure injured parties receive care.
Temporary contract additional tow operators to meet surge demand.
Deploy mobile rapid-charging units to revive low-battery vehicles and clear lanes.
Send live updates and suggested detour routes to drivers via navigation platforms.

plan.plan_title: Queue Unrest at Electronic City Charging Hub

steps.details: Dispatch local police to rapidly de-escalate disputes and ensure public order.
Hub security to separate parties and facilitate mediated resolutions to conflicts.
Identify and prioritise EVs with critical battery levels for emergency service.
Inform queues about expected restoration times and available alternatives to reduce panic.
Assess need for queue management, booking systems or security upgrades to prevent future unrest.
